name: Witch Knight
description:
Witch Knight Is a 2D platform adventure game. 

This is more of a concept in it's current state since it is currently incomplete. I would like to add combat mechanics, more movement mechanics such as dashing and wall jumping and of course more levels and art. If I continue working on this project I will make sure to post an updated version at a later date.

Features:

-dark lit effect

-Sword & Swocery inspired art style

Music used

"Dark Walk" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
